alert.note: Alert for Bennett (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Todd, southern Mellette, southeastern Jackson and northeastern Bennett Counties through 700 PM MDT/800 PM CDT/... At 615 PM MDT/715 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles south of Norris to 4 miles southwest of Mission. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mission, White River, Rosebud, Saint Francis, Parmelee, Norris, Wood, Cedar Butte, Mosher, Upper Cut Meat, He Dog, Soldier Creek, Black Pipe, Butte Creek, Two Strike, Swift Bear, Ring Thunder, Fairgrounds Housing, Antelope and Horse Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
